name: Mitigation Playbook for Regsvr32 Exploitation Incident
description: This playbook addresses the incident where an attacker leveraged Regsvr32 to execute a malicious DLL on Workstation-12, aiming to mitigate any potential damage and secure the environment.

parallel--cc1867a1-d468-4a80-9bcf-36dc29.name: Execute Mitigations
parallel--cc1867a1-d468-4a80-9bcf-36dc29.description: Execute all necessary mitigations for the Regsvr32 exploitation incident in parallel.

action--312fb737-aafa-4b21-a90e-d6c3f73b.name: Inspect and Delete Malicious File
action--312fb737-aafa-4b21-a90e-d6c3f73b.description: Inspect Server-1 and delete the disguised svchost.exe file located in C:\Windows\System32.

action--54b1c459-f698-434d-963b-c3b0edc5.name: Establish File Integrity Monitoring
action--54b1c459-f698-434d-963b-c3b0edc5.description: Enable file integrity monitoring on Server-1 to detect unauthorized changes or renaming of critical executables.

action--d5fbf486-f7d9-4944-a0be-4444b549.name: Update Process Execution Policies
action--d5fbf486-f7d9-4944-a0be-4444b549.description: Review and update execution policies on Server-1 to prevent unauthorized binary executions.

action--bfe9bd0f-b238-4f01-bafa-6a0f3812.name: Revoke Database Access for Server-1
action--bfe9bd0f-b238-4f01-bafa-6a0f3812.description: Revoke access to Workstation-12 databases for processes originating from Server-1 until further investigation.

commands.command: sqlcmd -S Workstation-12 -Q "REVOKE CONNECT ON DATABASE::Workstation12DB FROM [Server-1$];"

action--7e8a70cd-c05b-41f0-b175-828214b6.name: Check Logs and Improve Security Policies
action--7e8a70cd-c05b-41f0-b175-828214b6.description: Check Server-1's and Workstation-12's logs for unauthorized access patterns and improve authentication mechanisms.

commands.command: Invoke-Command -ComputerName Server-1,Workstation-12 -ScriptBlock { Get-EventLog -LogName Security -EntryType FailureAudit }; Set-ADDefaultDomainPasswordPolicy -LockoutThreshold 5 -LockoutDuration 00:30:00
